metadata.title: CVE-2023-27783 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in TCPreplay tcprewrite v.4.4.3 allows a remote attacker tocause a denial of service via the tcpedit_dlt_cleanup function atplugins/dlt_plugins.c.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
